B2 the fact that people or things look or are the same: I can see the similarity between you and your mother. The book bears several striking similarities to last year's bestseller.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a great deal of similarity between Caroline and her mother .His situation has several similarities with our own.The teacher found several suspicious similarities between their work.The painting bears a striking similarity to one in the Louvre.
